ï¼ˆ å…³äº radical clock ï¼šRadical clocks are compounds that undergo a unimolecular radical reaction at a known rate. The use of these compounds in competition experiments with bimolecular radical reactions allows the measurement of unknown rates, thus functioning as a molecular “clock”. ï¼‰
